name: ColorJetz
description:
Run, run, ColorJetz! The fastest intergalactic race is here.

Description

Beat the enemy  driving your own jet  and win races to discover more and more circuits.

How to play

Show how far can you go with our controls:

Accelerate pressing [Q]  and use [O]  to turn left and [P]  to turn right.
